page.title: 12PLACES TO LIVE COVENTRY S.W.
page.content: The sector has a wide cross section of types of housing.It ranges from property over 100 years old to modern housing and from private to council owned property. {COUNCIL HOUSING. Much of the council property is flats where large numbers of people can live in a small area.This can cause many social problems.There are also houses that are usually built close together. {PRIVATE HOUSING. Part of the area of private housing was built nearly 70 years ago when houses were needed quickly for people coming into a booming industrial city. They were mainly terraced back to back houses.More recently the houses built have been semi-detatched with larger gardens and more space between them. The property to the south is often detatched and the more expensive kind.
